title: Agnes Grey - contrast regarding Mrs. Bloomfield

content.question: In the sentence “Hitherto...untold”, the narrator presents which of the following contrasts regarding Mrs. Bloomfield’s qualities?

choices.label: What Mrs. Bloomfield reveals of herself to the narrator versus what she reveals to the children’s mother
What the narrator observes of those qualities versus what the narrator is willing to assume
What Mrs. Bloomfield knows about those qualities versus what she is unaware of
What the narrator values of those qualities versus what Mrs. Bloomfield values about them

content.answer: What the narrator observes of those qualities versus what the narrator is willing to assume

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
